alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 20 at 8:27PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MITCHELL...SOUTHWESTERN JEWELL...SMITH AND NORTHERN OSBORNE COUNTIES... At 827 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Mankato to near Ionia to near Osborne, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Burr Oak around 830 PM CDT. Ionia around 835 PM CDT. Mankato around 845 PM CDT. Cawker City and Jewell around 905 PM CDT. Glen Elder around 915 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
